item.title: How to customize QPushButton Icons
item.description: For one of my project I had to display a customized push button. I found a couple of ways to do this. The goal is to display the following icon inside a QPushButton. Using QtGui.QIcon Let’s pretend our image is at /Users/j35/Desktop/button_rotation_left.png _icon = QtGui.QIcon("/Users/j35/Desktop/button_rotation_left.png") my_button = QtGui.QPushButton() my_button.setIcon(_icon) my_button.setIconSize(QtCore.QSize(50, 300)) The problem of using this way, is that the button looses its push button feature that changes the look of the button when the user click it.
